doc:
Luke Askew https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Luke_Askew 0 Francis Luke Askew (March 26, 1932 – March 29, 2012) was an American actor best known for his role in the 1969 film Easy Rider. He appeared in many westerns, and had a rare lead role in the spaghetti Western Night of the Serpent (La notte dei serpenti; 1969). Francis_Luke_Askew ( March_26_,_1932 – March_29_,_2012 ) was an_American_actor best_known for his_role in the_1969_film_Easy_Rider . He appeared in many_westerns , and had a_rare_lead_role in the_spaghetti Western_Night of the_Serpent_(_La_notte_dei_serpenti ; 1969_) .
